items.details: Upcoming Tests Tuesday January 20th - Vocabulary Workshop Unit 1-9 Tuesday Januart 20th - Grammar Worshop - Unit 3 (Verbs) Wednesday January - 21st - Math Topic 8 Reading update There is no reading homework from our textbooks at the moment, so I expect students to complete their reading through ReadWorks instead. This ensures everyone is still practicing reading regularly. Reading - Heroes / Titanic Social Studies - Branches of Govern Science - Volcanic Eruptions These stories will help you with many subjects. Please make sure students are logging into ReadWorks and completing the assigned stories. I have added new passages, including one about the Titanic and another on the three branches of government, which link closely to our class learning. Students should also read the books they borrowed from the library today and complete AR quizzes for those books once finished. How to log in: Go to www.readworks.org/student Class code: YU6GQ2 Password: 1234 (unless already changed) Thank you for your continued support. Math Complete Additional Practice 8-6 student book and homework book. I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data. Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills. Social Studies Read and complete pages 158-165 Complete the Readworks story about branches of government. Watch the videos about levels of government https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sQNz2liUuY https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RwQ2U2iKswU Language Arts Complete pages 110-111 in the grammar workshop book Korean 268-274 Language Arts
